description:
The Ingram Firm, L.L.C., is a Largo, Maryland-based law firm that represents clients in Chapters 7, 9, 11, 12 and 13 bankruptcy cases. The brother-and-sister due that is attorney Anika T. Ingram and attorney Damani K. Ingram strive to empower individuals who face financial hardship and who desire a fresh start. Having guided hundreds of clients through the bankruptcy process, they know better than most that much more goes into it than simply filing. The legal decisions and events leading up to a discharge can affect a person's life for the worse or the better. The firm works diligently and with clients' goals always top-of-mind to ensure it is for the latter.

Mr. Ingram and Ms. Ingram founded the law firm with the desire to help others, period. This goal drove each of them to educate themselves in several areas of the law and to gain experience both in and out of the courtroom. As a result, they can competently navigate clients through the following matters and to a favorable result:

  • Personal injury
  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Civil rights
  • Medical malpractice
  • Premises liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Criminal defense
  • DUI/DWI
  • Family law
  • Divorce
  • Child custody
  • Business and commercial law
  • Business organizations
  • Immigration and naturalization law
  • Entertainment, sports and leisure law

The Ingram Firm, L.L.C., has a reputation for providing exceptional legal representation and guidance. The team takes a personalized approach and remains flexible at every touchpoint, beginning with the free initial consultation. The law firm understands that legal matters are never convenient. However, it strives to make them less intrusive by offering virtual appointments, accepting credit cards as payment and pricing their services competitively.

The Ingram Firm, L.C.C., is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
